text: Rick May (September 21, 1940 â€“ April 5, 2020) was a voice actor from Seattle. He voiced the Soldier in Team Fortress 2 and Peppy Hare in Star Fox 64. He also voiced many other characters from other video games. May was infected with COVID-19 in March 2020 and later died on April 5. ==Roles== * Peppy Hare and Andross - Star Fox 64 * Dr. M - Sly 3: Honor Among Thieves * The Soldier - Team Fortress 2 * Genghis Khan - Age of Empires II * Dadfish and Marty Sardini in Freddi Fish 5. * Wingnut in Pajama Sam 2. ==Death== May suffered a stroke in February 2020. Because of this, he was moved to a nursing home so that he could get rehabilitation. On April 5, 2020, May died due to complications related to COVID-19 at the Swedish Medical Center in Seattle, with his death being reported on April 8. ==Legacy== On May 1, 2020, Valve made an update to Team Fortress 2, dedicating their tributes to May, who voiced the Soldier. They added memorial statues of Soldier to various maps in-game for the rest of May 2020, as a tribute for May's work for his work on voice-acting. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Actors from Seattle Category:American stage actors Category:American video game actors Category:American radio actors Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Washington (state)
